mastergl.pdp

Class JsonParserUtility

  • java.lang.Object
    • mastergl.pdp.JsonParserUtility
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.os.Parcelable

    public class JsonParserUtility
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.os.Parcelable
    This class provides utility to get a json file from url, and stock the Json object in members. The task for downloading the file may be long, so it has to be done in background for a good user experience. That task is called when the execute method is called (without any parameters).
    See Also:
    WayManager

    • Nested Class Summary

      • getAndParse

        protected void getAndParse()
        This is the method which has to ran in background. It downloading the file out of the url passing in members to the constructor. it returns nothing because the result is stock in the mJsonObject member.

      • getJSObject

        public org.json.JSONObject getJSObject()
        Be careful to call this method AFTER the getAndParse method. Otherwise, mJsonObject will be null.
        Returns:
        the JsonObject stocking the json file.

      • getRoute

        public org.json.JSONObject getRoute(int index)
                             throws org.json.JSONException
        Get the route object at the specified index of the route array.
        Parameters:
        index - the index where to search the route.
        Returns:
        the route at the specified index.
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException - throws if there is a problem, like a out of bounds index or a non-well parsed JSON stream.

      • getLeg

        public org.json.JSONObject getLeg(int indexRoute,
                         int indexLeg)
                           throws org.json.JSONException
        In the leg array specified by indexRoute in the route array, get the leg specified by indexLeg.
        Parameters:
        indexRoute - the index of the route in the route array.
        indexLeg - the index of the leg in the leg array.
        Returns:
        the specified leg, which is a array of step.
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException - throws if there is a problem, like a out of bounds index or a non-well parsed JSON stream.

      • getLeg

        public org.json.JSONObject getLeg(int indexLeg)
                           throws org.json.JSONException
        Same method than #getLeg(int indexRoute,int indexLeg) but with indexRoute equal to 0.
        Parameters:
        indexLeg - the index of the leg in the leg array.
        Returns:
        the specified leg, which is a array of step.
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException - throws if there is a problem, like a out of bounds index or a non-well parsed JSON stream.

      • getStep

        public org.json.JSONObject getStep(int indexRoute,
                          int indexLeg,
                          int indexStep)
                            throws org.json.JSONException
        In the steps array specified by indexLeg in the leg array specified by indexRoute in the route array, get the step specified by indexStep.
        Parameters:
        indexRoute - the index of the route in the route array.
        indexLeg - the index of the leg in the leg array.
        indexStep - the index of the step in the steps array.
        Returns:
        the specified step.
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException - throws if there is a problem, like a out of bounds index or a non-well parsed JSON stream.

      • getStep

        public org.json.JSONObject getStep(int indexStep)
                            throws org.json.JSONException
        Same method than #getStep(int indexRoute, int indexLeg,int indexStep) but with indexRoute and indexLeg equals to 0.
        Parameters:
        indexStep - the index of the step in the steps array.
        Returns:
        the specified step.
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException - throws if there is a problem, like a out of bounds index or a non-well parsed JSON stream.

      • getBounds

        public java.util.List<com.google.android.gms.maps.model.LatLng> getBounds()
        Get the camera bounds of the way written in the json file.
        Returns:
        the southwest and the northeast LatLng points of the bounds.
